subject: Add CORS support to health endpoint for cross-origin diagnostics
body:
The frontend health check from devmade-ai.github.io was failing because
the /api/health endpoint had no CORS headers. Extract shared CORS logic
into api/cors.ts and apply it to both health and send-interest handlers.

https://claude.ai/code/session_01XfRMoBtpQLXVTWNanmyv6J
title: Add CORS support to health endpoint for cross-origin diagnostics
